title: Please help me identify this font
content:
I am not sure if this is the right place to ask this but could someone please help me identify this font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820062731im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sandridge%20tshirt_5743.jpeg)

Thank you for your time!
author: chickie

comments.content: You are correct; this is the General Discussions forum. The Type ID forum is the proper place for this request.
